headline: Verizon says right-sizing the organization, saving on OpEx
summary: Says “just the beginning of the efficiencies we are uncovering.” Says reducing complexity and removing pain points. Says examining every dollar of OpEx and CapEx. Says bar will be high for investments. Says still in “early stages” of transformation. Says will not rely on “empty price increases” to drive short term revenue and earnings. Says MVNO agreement with Charter and Comcast is an “accretive deal.” Says 2026 guidance reflects the beginning of the company’s turnaround. Comments taken from Q4
